雘，读huò，解释为：赤石脂（一种粉红色陶土）之类，红色或青色的的矿物，古代用作颜料。泛指好的彩色。
雘, pronounced huò, is interpreted as: red or cyan minerals such as red stone fat (a kind of pink clay), which was used as a pigment in ancient times. Refers to good colors in general.

雘字的基本解释

雘
huò
赤石脂（一种粉红色陶土）之类，古代用作颜料：“若作梓材，既勤朴斫，惟其涂丹雘。”

雘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wò］
［《廣韻》烏郭切，入鐸，影。］
亦作“艧2”。
赤石脂之类，古人以为上等的红颜料。

雘字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【隹字部】　雘； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1368第30
【唐韻】【正韻】烏郭切【集韻】【韻會】屋郭切，?音蠖。【說文】善丹也。从丹蒦聲。【書·梓材】惟其塗丹雘。【釋文】烏郭反。【山海經】雞山，其下多丹雘。【註】郭璞曰：雘，赤色者。吳任臣曰：蓋赤石脂之類。　又【集韻】欝縛切，音嬳。義同。【書·丹雘釋文】又枉略反。　又【集韻】王縛切，音籰。砮雘丹也。　又瑚故切，音護。【博雅】丹也。

雘字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
雘字的起名意思

暂无。

雘
Basic explanation of words
雘
huò
Chishizhi (a kind of pink pottery clay) was used as a pigment in ancient times: "If it is made of catalpa, it is not only diligent and simple, but it is coated with Danshu."
雘
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wò］
["Guangyun" Wu Guoqie, enter the duo, shadow. ]
Also known as "艧2".
The ancients thought of red pigment to be the best red pigment.
雘
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【隹字部】　雘; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 1368 30
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Wu Guo Qi [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Wu Guo Qi,? Yin Mo. [Said the text] Shan Dan also. From the sound of Dan Lei. 【Book·Zicai】Only its painted Danyu. [Explanation] Wu Guo Fan. [Shan Hai Jing] Jishan, under which there are many Danyu. [Note] Guo Pu said: 雘, the red one. Wu Renchen said: Gai Chi Shizhi and the like.　 [Ji Yun] Binding cut, sound 嬳. The same meaning. 【Book·Danyu Interpretation】It's in vain again.　[Jiyun] Wang Fuqie, sound. Yan Yu Dan also.　Follow the old and cut again, and protect the sound. [Bo Ya] Dan Ye.
